prompt: When a new email arrives in Gmail with label 'invoices', add a row to Google Sheets with the sender, subject, and date.
Post a Slack message to #backlog whenever a new Trello card is added to the 'Backlog' list.
When a new video is uploaded to YouTube on my channel, post the title and link to Twitter.
Send a Discord reminder 10 minutes before any Google Calendar event starts.
Create a Todoist task when a new page is created in Notion, using the page title.
When a Stripe charge succeeds over $100, send a Slack message to #sales with the customer and amount.
